Mr. Speaker, I thank Chair Latta, Ranking Members Pallone and  Schakowsky, and Representatives Houchin, Trahan, and Castor for joining  me in this important legislation. I urge Members to vote ``yes.''

…contemplating suicide.  Experts have made it clear that there is no good reason for consumers  to purchase sodium nitrite at such high concentrations.

I commend Representative Trahan for her leadership on this issue, and  I urge my colleagues to support the bill. I reserve the balance of my  time.

I rise today in strong support of H.R. 1442, the Youth Poisoning  Protection Act, led by Representative Trahan.
